DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate long-term safety dapoxetine men rapid ejaculation .
DOC.brief_title: An Open-Label Study Long-Term Safety Dapoxetine HCl Treatment Rapid Ejaculation
DOC.detailed_description: This multicenter , open-label ( patient Investigators know name drug receive ) study evaluate long-term safety efficacy dapoxetine therapy adult men premature ( rapid ) ejaculation ( PE ) participate 1 2 previous study dapoxetine ( ALZA Protocol C-2002-012 C-2002-013 ) . The length study 9 month . During study , patient monitor safety review adverse event finding routine laboratory test , vital sign measurement , electrocardiogram ( ECGs ) , physical examination . Oral tablet dapoxetine ( 30 mg 60 mg ) self-administered patient daily , need , 9 month . No 1 dose within 24-hour period take . If 60 mg dose dapoxetine well tolerate , dose may decrease 30 mg dapoxetine remainder study . Patients tolerate 30 mg dose dapoxetine discontinue study .
DOC.criteria: Enrollment within 30 day completion 1 2 Phase 3 control study ( ALZA Study C2002012 Study C2002013 ) In opinion Investigator , patient could safely continue use dapoxetine treatment Had systolic blood pressure < =180 mm Hg diastolic blood pressure < =100 mm Hg Agreement patient 's sexual partner ( childbearing potential ) ensure use medically acceptable method contraception duration study Currently take protocoldefined prohibited medication Reported diagnosis sexually transmitted disease , Had new allergy hypersensitivity dapoxetine selective serotonin reuptake inhibitor In opinion Investigator incapable follow study schedule reason
